name: Eternal Vacation
description:
Eternal vacation is an open world where you are on vacation and can talk to the local villagers. Find out what they think about the world. Explore the landscape. You can exit the game when you want, it is supposed to be a place you travel, like travelling you leave when you want.

Inspired by PSX style graphics and games like zelda, etc.

Controls:

WASD - walk

Mouse - look around

E - interact

(Righ now, to exit the game you need to use the windows key)

Music: CrystalMeshDavid (Freesound.org)

Note: This was for the #minijam93 , with is very incomplete but I intend to turn it into a proper game.
